import React from "react"; import {useForm} from "react-hook-form"; import axios from "axios"; import {Link, useHistory} from "react-router-dom"; import PinknavLeft from "../../Components/Pinknav/pinknav-left"; import "./register.css" function SignUp() { const {handleSubmit, register, formState: {errors}} = useForm() const history = useHistory() async function registrationSubmit(data) { console.log(data) console.log(data.role) try { await axios.post(`https://frontend-educational-backend.herokuapp.com/api/auth/signup`, { username: data.username, email: data.email, password: data.password, role: [data.role], } ) history.push('/inlog') } catch (e) { console.error(e) } } return ( <>

Registratie

{errors.email &&

{errors.email.message}

}

Heb je al een account? Log je hier dan in!

) } export default SignUp
